direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods parse documents from a file path, but 'streamParser' parses progressively while 'load' parses fully.
Both methods handle parsing of input streams with similar control flows and exception handling.
The 'streamParser' method relies on 'detectCharset' to determine the character set of the input stream.
Both methods involve opening and handling input streams from files.
Both methods involve extracting and validating character sets from different sources (content type header vs. input stream).
Both methods involve validating character sets, which is crucial for correct parsing.
Both methods involve detecting character sets from byte order marks (BOM) in input streams.
